products.name: PREMIXX 30
products.description: NS Arcus introduces PREMIXX 30, a dry mix concrete tailored to provide high strength (min. 30Mpa) ready to use for structural strengthening. It is fast and easy to use. The three ready-to-pour steps are: Open, add water and pour.
products.introduction: NS Premixx 30, is a high-strength dry mix concrete used for strengthening columns and beams of load-bearing structures. It is a product that works well in outlying areas, residences, gardens, and other locations where high-quality concrete is needed.

features.title: Packed in specially designed laminated bags

uses.title: USES
uses.description: NS Premixx 30, is a high-strength dry mix concrete used for strengthening columns and beams of load-bearing structures. It is a product that works well in outlying areas, residences, gardens, and other locations where high-quality concrete is needed.

featureGroups.title: Advantages
features: Concrete produced in controlled fully automated units.
Extremely easy to mix and use.
Produced from high-quality material.
Perfect quality and strength as per requirement.
Packed in specially designed laminated bags to maintain strength.
Available in various combinations as per requirement.
24*7 technical support.

featureGroups.title: Instructions
features: Empty the PREMIXX M-30 bag into a wheelbarrow, bucket or flat clean surface.
Measure (3.5-4.5) liter of water.
Add the water in the dry mix concrete. Add more water gradually, if required.
Mix thoroughly with a spade till desired consistency is attained.

featureGroups.title: Where to Use
features: Slabs and floors of the house.
Places where waterproofing is required.
Flooring and leveling works.
Repair and maintenance of concrete structures.
Gardens, pavements, landscaping and related works.
Roads driveways.

featureGroups.title: Shelf Life
features: 90 days from the date of manufacturing.

products.name: PREMIXX 40
products.description: NS Arcus introduces PREMIXX 40 micro, a premixed high strength ready to use concrete for structural strengthening. It is fast and easy to use. The three ready-to-pour steps are: Open, add water and pour.
products.introduction: NS Premixx 40, is a high-strength dry mix concrete used for strengthening columns and beams of load-bearing structures. It is a product that works well in outlying areas, residences, gardens, and other locations where high-quality concrete is needed.

uses.title: USES
uses.description: NS Premixx 40, is a high-strength dry mix concrete used for strengthening columns and beams of load-bearing structures. It is a product that works well in outlying areas, residences, gardens, and other locations where high-quality concrete is needed.

featureGroups.title: Advantages
features: Very high strength materials â€“ appreciable boost in strength and load-carrying capacity without a significant increase in dead load.
The expansion system compensates for shrinkage settlement in the plastic stage.
Good Bond with old concrete.
No added chloride.
24*7 technical support.

featureGroups.title: Instructions
features: Empty the PREMIXX 40 bag into the mixer.
Measure 2-3 liters of water.
Add the water in the mix. Add more water gradually, if required.
Mix thoroughly with a spade till desired consistency is attained.

featureGroups.title: Safety Instructions
features: Premixx contains cement which can cause irritation and respiratory disorder
Avoid contact with eyes.
Do not use it without proper PPE.
Keep out of the reach of children.

featureGroups.title: Hand Mixing
features: Empty Premixx40 Micro into a wheelbarrow bucket or a flat, clean surface.
Measure 2-3 liters of water per bag.
Gradually add water in stages, mixing thoroughly with a spade or something similar, after each addition of water.
Check on the consistency of the concrete. Use no more water than is necessary to allow the concrete to be easily placed and finished.

featureGroups.title: Shelf Life
features: 60 days from the date of manufacturing.
